mapper.sql: userId,Id,phone,deviceType,deviceToken,headImage, registerTime, userLevel, nickName, isDisable, isEasemob, userSource, inviteCode,passWord
mapper.update:
update user
userLevel=#{userLevel},
isDisable=#{isDisable},
isEasemob=#{isEasemob},
isEasemob=#{isEasemob},
headImage=#{headImage},
passWord=#{passWord},
nickName=#{nickName},
where userId=#{userId}
mapper.select: select count(1) from user where phone=#{phone}

select
from user where phone=#{phone} and passWord=#{passWord}

SELECT count(1) FROM user a inner join userdatum b on a.userId=b.userId where 1=1
and b.gender=#{gender}

SELECT a.userId,a.Id,a.headImage,a.userLevel,a.nickName,a.inviteCode,b.age,b.gender FROM user a inner join userdatum b on a.userId=b.userId inner join homeuser c on a.userId=c.userId where c.homeType=1 order by c.sortColumn desc

SELECT a.userId,a.Id,a.headImage,a.userLevel,a.nickName,a.inviteCode,b.age,b.gender, Fn_GetRange(#{lat},#{lon},c.latitude,c.longitude) AS rangeM,b.sign,b.sexuat FROM user a inner join userdatum b on a.userId=b.userId inner join userposition c on a.userId=c.userId where a.userId!=#{userId}
ORDER BY rangeM ASC LIMIT #{pageIndex},#{pageSize}
SELECT count(1) FROM user a inner join userdatum b on a.userId=b.userId inner join userposition c on a.userId=c.userId where a.userId!=#{userId}

SELECT a.headImage,a.Id,a.nickName,b.gender,b.age,b.cityId,b.sign,b.weight,b.height,b.shape,b.sexuat, Fn_GetRange(#{lat},#{lon},c.latitude,c.longitude) AS rangeM,a.userLevel FROM user a inner join userdatum b on a.userId=b.userId inner join userposition c on a.userId=c.userId where a.userId=#{userId};

SELECT a.headImage,a.Id,a.nickName,b.gender,b.age,b.cityId,b.sign,b.weight,b.height,b.shape,b.sexuat, a.userLevel,a.inviteCode FROM user a inner join userdatum b on a.userId=b.userId where a.userId=#{userId};
mapper.update: update user set browseNumber=browseNumber+1 where userId=#{userId};
mapper.select: SELECT a.userId,a.Id,a.headImage,a.userLevel,a.nickName,a.inviteCode, b.age,b.gender,b.sign FROM user a inner join userdatum b on a.userId=b.userId inner join userlike as c on a.userId=c.likeUserId where c.userId=#{userId} order by c.likeDate desc

SELECT a.userId,a.Id,a.headImage,a.userLevel,a.nickName,a.inviteCode, b.age,b.gender,b.sign,c.browseDate FROM user a inner join userdatum b on a.userId=b.userId inner join userbrowse as c on a.userId=c.browseId where c.toUserId=#{userId} and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) <c.browseDate order by c.browseDate desc LIMIT #{pageIndex},#{pageSize}
select b.datumId,b.userId,b.age,b.gender,b.cityId,b.weight,b.height,b.shape,b.sexuat,b.sign, a.nickName,headImage from user a inner join userdatum b on a.userId=b.userId where b.userId=#{userId}
